channel.title: 法新社
channel.description: 这是一个追踪法新社news的种子

item.title: 斯洛伐克人周六在紧张的总统选举中进行了第一轮投票，倾向俄罗斯的执政阵营与亲乌克兰的候选人在邻国之间的战争问题上分歧严重，⬇️。
item.description:
Slovaks voted on Saturday in the first round of a tight presidential election pitting the Russia-leaning ruling camp against a pro-Ukraine candidate, amid deep divisions on the war between the neighbouring rivals ⬇️https://t.co/k7Sk5jJoQf

— AFP News Agency (@AFP) March 23, 2024

item.title: 周六，马维克-维纳尔斯（Maverick Vinales）在葡萄牙 MotoGP 冲刺赛中夺冠，带领西班牙队横扫领奖台 ⬇️
item.description:
Maverick Vinales won the sprint race at the Portuguese MotoGP on Saturday, leading a Spanish sweep of the podium ⬇️https://t.co/xmxeBLHoUA pic.twitter.com/W2YJ1O4dVi

— AFP News Agency (@AFP) March 23, 2024

item.title: 莫斯科因音乐厅袭击事件而震惊，此次袭击造成 130 多人死亡。周六黎明前，献血中心就排起了长队，震惊的居民们向克罗库斯市政厅袭击事件的受害者表示声援。阅读更多 ➡️
item.description:
Moscow has been stunned by the concert hall attack in which more than 130 people were killed.

Queues formed before dawn Saturday at blood donor centres as shocked residents showed solidarity for victims of the Crocus City Hall attack.

Read more ➡️ https://t.co/ds6HnjrIUG pic.twitter.com/D6fKHtZdEn

— AFP News Agency (@AFP) March 23, 2024

item.title: #AFP 本周图片（3 月 16-22 日）
item.description:
#AFP PICTURES OF THE WEEK (March 16-22) https://t.co/oz4x76nN2G pic.twitter.com/4QW1kCXkZP

— AFP Photo (@AFPphoto) March 23, 2024

item.title: 意大利钢琴家毛里奇奥-波利尼（Maurizio Pollini）是肖邦和贝多芬的演奏家，曾与斯卡拉歌剧院合作长达数十年之久。
item.description:
Italian pianist Maurizio Pollini, a virtuoso of Chopin and Beethoven who enjoyed a decades-long collaboration with La Scala, died Saturday age 82, the Milan opera house announced.https://t.co/zauCSBYg7i

— AFP News Agency (@AFP) March 23, 2024

item.title: 周六早些时候，海地首都爆发了激烈的枪战，居民们已经忍受着混乱的暴力和严重的食品短缺，他们对迟迟不能宣布旨在恢复稳定的过渡政府感到越来越沮丧。
item.description:
Heavy gunfire erupted early Saturday in the Haitian capital as residents, already enduring chaotic violence and grave food shortages, faced mounting frustration over delays in announcing a transitional government meant to restore stability. https://t.co/HjTtVq2Oxc

— AFP News Agency (@AFP) March 23, 2024

item.title: 在巴西东南部，特别是在里约热内卢州的山区，一场强风暴已造成至少九人丧生，当局周六在那里部署了救援队，以应对 "危急 "情况。
item.description:
A powerful storm has claimed at least nine lives in southeastern Brazil, particularly in the mountainous part of Rio de Janeiro state, where authorities on Saturday deployed rescue teams to deal with a "critical" situation.https://t.co/Fn2hdoAPka

— AFP News Agency (@AFP) March 23, 2024

item.title: 里沙巴-潘特（Rishabh Pant）在一场可怕的车祸后于周六重返精英板球赛场，但德里首都队在印度超级联赛中输给了旁遮普国王队，这给他的 "情感 "回归蒙上了阴影。
item.description:
Rishabh Pant's "emotional" return to elite cricket Saturday after a horror car crash was clouded by Delhi Capitals' loss to Punjab Kings in the Indian Premier League.#AFPSports https://t.co/lNmSILtOCv

— AFP News Agency (@AFP) March 23, 2024

item.title: 周六，俄罗斯宣称在领土上取得了新的胜利，而乌克兰军队却在苦苦寻找武器和部队，同时双方又互相发动了新的致命空袭。
item.description:
Russia on Saturday claimed a new territorial victory over Ukrainian forces struggling to find weapons and troops while the two sides staged deadly new aerial attacks on each other.https://t.co/tmnHolMoLK

— AFP News Agency (@AFP) March 23, 2024

item.title: 科妮莉亚-惠特尔（Cornelia Huetter）周六在主场赢得了本赛季世界杯女子速降赛的最后一场比赛，摘得了她的第一个水晶球，使拉拉-古特-贝赫拉米（Lara Gut-Behrami）未能获得本赛季的第四个冠军头衔。
item.description:
Cornelia Huetter won the final women's World Cup downhill race of the season at home on Saturday, sealing her first crystal globe to deny Lara Gut-Behrami a fourth title this season.#AFPSports https://t.co/wiM6z9m5WT

— AFP News Agency (@AFP) March 23, 2024

item.title: 视频：被毁坏的阿尼城位于世界上最敏感的边界之一，这座摇摇欲坠的桥梁象征着土耳其和亚美尼亚之间的关系。历史学家希望，修复这座桥可以修复两国之间的关系。
item.description:
VIDEO: The ruined city of Ani stands on one of the world's most sensitive borders, a crumbling bridge symbolising the state of relations between Turkey and Armenia. Historians hope that restoring it could repair ties between the two countries. pic.twitter.com/sNVGMEbQS2

— AFP News Agency (@AFP) March 23, 2024

item.title: 视频：越南檳椥省因長期熱浪和鹽水入侵導致淡水短缺，嚴重影響農作物和當地農民的生計。
item.description:
VIDEO: A prolonged heatwave and saline intrusion are causing a shortage of fresh water in Vietnam's Ben Tre province, badly affecting crops and the livelihoods of local farmers. pic.twitter.com/Evctkrxv7j

— AFP News Agency (@AFP) March 23, 2024

item.title: 联合国秘书长安东尼奥-古特雷斯（Antonio Guterres）周六在访问饱受战争蹂躏的加沙时说，世界已经看够了加沙的恐怖，并呼吁停火以允许更多援助进入。
item.description:
UN Secretary-General Antonio Guterres, on a visit to the doorstep of war-ravaged Gaza, on Saturday said the world has seen enough of its horrors and appealed for a ceasefire to allow in more aid.https://t.co/3CQDfY0ozj pic.twitter.com/5UaggJdlwd

— AFP News Agency (@AFP) March 23, 2024

item.title: 周六，奥地利选手科妮莉亚-惠特尔（Cornelia Huetter）在萨尔巴赫主场赢得了本赛季最后一场女子世界杯速降赛的冠军，摘得该项目水晶球。
item.description:
Austrian Cornelia Huetter won the final women's World Cup downhill race of the season at home in Saalbach on Saturday to claim the crystal globe in the discipline.#AFPSports https://t.co/43W1CMDUDC

— AFP News Agency (@AFP) March 23, 2024

item.title: 视频：鲨鱼咬人事件总体上极为罕见，科学家希望更多人了解这一事实，尤其是在鲨鱼数量不断减少、亟待保护的情况下。
item.description:
VIDEO: Shark bites are exceedingly rare overall, a fact scientists wish more people knew, especially amid declining shark populations desperately in need of conservation. pic.twitter.com/jXTMRunlAP

— AFP News Agency (@AFP) March 23, 2024

item.title: 视频：时隔近三十年后，一个因描述制裁下的残酷生活而被萨达姆-侯赛因禁止播出的伊拉克电视节目重回荧屏。"瓦希巴的世界 "是伊拉克的一个节目，主要关注吸毒、犯罪、离婚和失业等社会问题。
item.description:
VIDEO: After nearly three decades, an Iraqi TV programme banned by Saddam Hussein for its gritty depiction of life under sanctions has returned to screens. "Wahiba's World" is an Iraqi show focusing on social issues such as drug addiction, crime, divorce and unemployment. pic.twitter.com/bp886hZjK2

— AFP News Agency (@AFP) March 23, 2024

item.title: 视频：英国报纸都以威尔士王妃凯瑟琳正在接受癌症治疗的消息为头条。自圣诞节以来，凯瑟琳王妃就没有出席过任何公开活动。
item.description:
VIDEO: UK newspapers all lead with news that Catherine, Princess of Wales, is being treated for cancer.
There have been months of sometimes frenzied speculation online about the whereabouts of the princess, who has not attended public engagements since Christmas. pic.twitter.com/eYijGiwZ70

— AFP News Agency (@AFP) March 23, 2024

item.title: 巴西队主教练小多利瓦尔表示，国家队和球员们正在经历一段 "艰难的时期"，以接受前国脚罗比尼奥和达尼-阿尔维斯的强奸罪名。
item.description:
Brazil coach Dorival Junior said the national team and players were going through a "difficult time" coming to terms with the rape convictions of former internationals Robinho and Dani Alves.#AFPSports https://t.co/28ZVxHx19l

— AFP News Agency (@AFP) March 23, 2024

item.title: 视频：印度尼西亚度假胜地巴厘岛上的一个海滩通常是纯净的，但现在却垃圾成堆--每年的季风都会造成这一惨景，令游客苦恼不已，当地官员也在争分夺秒地清理垃圾。
item.description:
VIDEO: A normally pristine beach on Indonesia's resort island of Bali is awash with garbage - a bleak annual event caused by the yearly monsoon which has left tourists vexed and local officials scrambling to clean up. pic.twitter.com/iRgH1sX7xT

— AFP News Agency (@AFP) March 23, 2024

item.title: 视频：新西兰老人聚在一起喝茶，完成一项重要任务：DIY 制作有朝一日他们自己使用的棺材。
item.description:
VIDEO: Elderly New Zealanders meet for cups of tea and a task of grave importance: building DIY caskets that they will one day use themselves. pic.twitter.com/yRHrpurMHM

— AFP News Agency (@AFP) March 23, 2024

item.title: 阿加莎-克里斯蒂 20 世纪 30 年代的打字机和她最后一部小说《赫尔克里-波洛》的手稿被保存在银行保险库中长达数十年之久，本周六将在一个新的展览中展出，该展览将深入探讨犯罪小说的核心 "阴暗面"。
item.description:
Agatha Christie's 1930s typewriter and the manuscript of her final Hercule Poirot novel, which was kept for decades in a bank vault, go on display Saturday in a new exhibition delving into the "dark stuff" at the heart of crime fiction.https://t.co/ZGjdQ5V632 pic.twitter.com/E5duNbZFTU

— AFP News Agency (@AFP) March 23, 2024

item.title: 视频：夏奇拉在迈阿密出席《Las Mujeres Ya No Lloran》专辑发行派对。
item.description:
VIDEO: Shakira attends her 'Las Mujeres Ya No Lloran' album release party in Miami. pic.twitter.com/Grsj840g7v

— AFP News Agency (@AFP) March 23, 2024

item.title: 视频：智利律师贡萨洛-蒋（Gonzalo Chiang）和他的狗萨姆（Sam）在圣地亚哥圣克里斯托瓦尔山（Cerro San Cristobal）的山路上散步时收集塑料垃圾。蒋正在努力推广 "plogging"（慢跑时捡拾垃圾）的做法。
item.description:
VIDEO: Chilean lawyer Gonzalo Chiang and his dog Sam collect plastic waste as they walk the trails of Cerro San Cristobal in Santiago. Chiang is on a quest to promote the practice of "plogging" -- picking up litter while jogging. pic.twitter.com/8NwTM8j3iS

— AFP News Agency (@AFP) March 23, 2024

item.title: 视频：维奥莱特-查奇（Violet Chachki）是有史以来第一位在巴黎传说中的疯马歌舞厅跳舞的男性变装皇后，她希望自己的出现能帮助 "传播 "她自己从变装中获得的 "治疗"。
item.description:
VIDEO: Violet Chachki is the first male-bodied drag queen ever to dance at the fabled Crazy Horse cabaret in Paris, where she hopes her appearance will help "spread the therapy" she herself got from drag. pic.twitter.com/9K3Miy7Mk1

— AFP News Agency (@AFP) March 23, 2024

item.title: 香港新的国家安全法于周六生效，对叛国和叛乱等罪行的严厉惩罚立即生效，最高可判处终身监禁。
item.description:
Hong Kong's new national security law came into force on Saturday, putting into immediate effect tough penalties of up to life imprisonment for crimes including treason and insurrection.https://t.co/Gzg7cjGVTk

— AFP News Agency (@AFP) March 23, 2024

item.title: 视频：在巴米扬省的一个斜坡边缘，选手们轮流从山坡上滑下，互相加油打气，团结一致，共同维护阿富汗滑雪运动的生命力。
item.description:
VIDEO: From the edge of a slope in the province of Bamiyan, rivals cheer each other on as they take turns to race down the mountainside, united in keeping skiing alive in Afghanistan. pic.twitter.com/01PCpFns4E

— AFP News Agency (@AFP) March 23, 2024

item.title: 据美国媒体报道，法国作家兼插画家劳伦特-德-布鲁霍夫（Laurent de Brunhoff）去世时年仅 98 岁，他成功地续写了和蔼可亲的大象 "巴巴尔 "的冒险故事--这只大象最初只是他母亲的一个睡前故事，后来被改编成深受儿童喜爱的....。
item.description:
French author and illustrator Laurent de Brunhoff, who died at the age of 98 according to US media, successfully continued the adventures of the affable elephant "Babar" -- first imagined as a bedtime story by his mother, before being turned into a beloved children's character.…

— AFP News Agency (@AFP) March 23, 2024

item.title: 周六，威尔士王妃凯瑟琳以一段高度个人化的视频宣布了她令人震惊的癌症诊断结果，赢得了赞誉。
item.description:
Catherine, Princess of Wales, won plaudits Saturday for a highly personal video announcing her shock cancer diagnosis, which came just weeks after King Charles III revealed he too is battling the disease.https://t.co/Wq3adXzhmO

— AFP News Agency (@AFP) March 23, 2024

item.title: 视频：墨西哥人聚集在墨西哥城郊外的特奥蒂瓦坎前西班牙金字塔，参加庆祝春分的传统活动。
item.description:
VIDEO: Mexicans gather at the pre-Hispanic pyramids of Teotihuacan on the outskirts of Mexico City for a tradition that celebrates spring equinox. pic.twitter.com/hbZUnxdgjG

— AFP News Agency (@AFP) March 23, 2024

item.title: 在海军突击队夺回一艘被劫持的散装货轮并解救出数名人质后数天，印度于周六将 35 名被指控的索马里海盗带到孟买。
item.description:
India brought 35 accused Somali pirates to Mumbai on Saturday, days after they were apprehended when naval commandos recaptured a hijacked bulk carrier and rescued several hostages.https://t.co/RWZpF1zxqW

— AFP News Agency (@AFP) March 23, 2024
